sect2.title: FAP_REQ_GEN_01 Creating object from specfication
sect2.simpara: Framework shall support creation object from specfication

sect2.title: FAP_UC_001 Making changes in the object

simplelist.member: There was a spec for object creation provided.
Object was created from the spec.
Some changes get required for the object.
There is mechanism of making change from dedicated change spec

sect2.title: FAP_REQ_STA_01 Transition by default
sect2.simpara: If no transion function nor operation is specified for the state then there shall the following default transition be done:

itemizedlist.listitem: Copying the first input current value if it is compatible to state.

sect2.simpara: NOTE: Earlier one more default transition was used: copying current value of the state to new value. Denied currently.

sect2.title: FAP_REQ_SPC_01 Initial value of state
sect2.simpara: There shall be possibility to specify initial value of state in object specification

sect2.title: FAP_REQ_SPC_02 State incapsulaton
sect2.simpara: Specification shall describe state with high level of incapsulation.
NOTE: this conforms with approach of representation the system as a set of state machines.

sect2.title: FAP_REQ_LOG_01 Logging error on construction phase
sect2.simpara: Logging shall record errors happend on construction phase

sect2.title: FAP_REQ_LOG_02 Log file specifying
sect2.simpara: FAP API shall allow requesting the logging into specific log file.
If this is not requested then FAP shall use default log file.

sect2.title: FAP_REQ_LOG_03 Logging in transition functions
sect2.simpara: Framework shall allow using logging from transition function
